structure.unit: RIOT, DISORDERLY CONDUCT, AND RELATED OFFENSES

law.catch_line: Duty status of service animal not a factor in application of KRS 525.200 and 525.205.
law.text: KRS 525.200 and 525.205 shall apply whether or not the service animal is on duty or off duty.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 419, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1998.
